attributes.action: Reduce the number of traffic lights that are left on for 24 hours a day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many sets of lights could be used part-time. At quiet times of the day they are useless in facilitating traffic flow, waste energy, and cause light pollution. The recently installed lights on the A303 roundabout at Podimore in Somerset are a perfect example.
